item.title: CVE-2023-45632|2024-09-12T18:09:22.059Z -- webdorado -- spidervplayer
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WebDorado SpiderVPlayer plugin <=Â 1.5.22 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31123|2024-08-02T01:46:04.603Z -- webdorado -- spiderfaq
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebDorado SpiderFAQ allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SpiderFAQ: from n/a through 1.3.2.
